scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run build.ng.module
scripts.build.ng.module: npm run build && node ./node_modules/.bin/ngc --project tsconfig.aot.json --outDir ./ && npm pack && npx cpy-cli '*.tgz' '../dist' --rename=nstudio-nativescript-checkbox.tgz
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run build.ng.module && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --no-hmr --env.aot
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run build.ng.module && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --no-hmr --env.aot
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
scripts.clean.all: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../demo-ng && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf hooks node_modules
